title: Bessent to push residency requirement for regional US Fed bank presidents
description: The move is another effort by the Trump administration to have more control over the US Federal Reserve.
content: United States Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent has said he would push a new requirement that the Federal Reserves regional bank presidents live in their districts for at least three years before taki… [+2892 chars]
